metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Ingredients: o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi  Instructions: o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal.

o Scramble eggs in the same pan. o Add noodles, fish sauce, tamarind paste, sugar, and lime juice, stir to combine. o Add bean sprouts, cooked shrimp, and chopped green onions. o Garnish with crushed peanuts and serve. Pajeon (Pancakes)  Ingredients: o 1 cup flour o 1 cup water o 1 egg o 1/2 cup green onions o 1/2 cup seafood (optional) o 1 tablespoon soy sauce o 1 tablespoon sesame oil  Instructions: o Mix flour, water, and beaten egg in a bowl.

Ingredients: o 2 red bell peppers o 1/2 cup walnuts o 1/4 cup breadcrumbs o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup olive oil o 1 tablespoon pomegranate molasses o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon salt  Instructions: o Roast bell peppers until charred, then peel and seed. o Blend peppers, walnuts, breadcrumbs, minced garlic, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, cumin, and salt in a food processor until smooth. o Serve with pita bread.

Ingredients:  1 cup dates, pitted  1 cup mixed nuts  1/4 cup dried fruit  1 tablespoon honey Instructions:  In a food processor, combine dates, mixed nuts, dried fruit, and honey.  Process until the mixture comes together.  Press the mixture into a greased baking dish.  Refrigerate for at least 1 hour before cutting into bars.  Store in an airtight container.

Ingredients: o 1 can chickpeas o 1 small onion o 2 cloves garlic o 1/4 cup parsley o 1 teaspoon cumin o 1 teaspoon coriander o 1 teaspoon salt o 1/4 cup flour o Oil for frying  Instructions: o Drain and rinse chickpeas. o Blend chickpeas, diced onion, minced garlic, chopped parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt in a food processor. o Add flour and mix until combined. o Form mixture into balls and fry in hot oil until golden.
